questions.question: The gimbal ring of a turn co-ordinator is inclined at about $30^{\circ}$ with respect to the aircraft's longitudinal axis in order to:
options: a. make the rate of turn more accurate
b. make the gyro sensitive to banking of the aircraft as well as to turning
c. make the gyro more effective during inverted flight
d. have a higher rotor speed which will prolong the life of the instrument

questions.question: If an aircraft turns as indicated in Figure 1, below:
options: a. the aircraft will turn through $180^{\circ}$ in two minutes
b. it will take one minute to turn through $90^{\circ}$
c. the aircraft is turning left at less than $3^{\circ}/$ second
d. the aircraft is turning left at $3^{\circ}/$ second

questions.question: A turn co-ordinator has (i) ..... pivoted (ii) in the case
options: b. (i) a single gimbal ring (ii) longitudinally
d. (i) two gimbal rings (ii) mutually perpendicular
